wordpressPage.title: Find A Residential Centre
wordpressPage.content:
We know it’s difficult to find residential sites to use for youth weekends away and we know how difficult it is to find somewhere online with a complete list of centres useable for youth work so here we have the first online youth work site offering you an easy way to find residential centres to suit your needs.

When looking for a centre bare in mind how many it can sleep (smaller centres are cheaper (generally)), also the size of the dorms. Smaller dorms make unpredictable gender numbers far easier to manage. You should always make sure leaders have separate rooms to young people.
